solution.text:
Mark the distance \(5.5\) units from a fixed point A on a given line to obtain a point O such that AO \(=5.5\) units
From O, mark a distance of \(1\) unit and mark the new point as B.
Find the mid-point of AB and mark that point as C.
Draw a semicircle with centre C and radius CB.
Draw a line perpendicular to AB passing through O and intersecting the semicircle at D.
Then OD = \(\sqrt{5.5}\)
